mapper.select: select m.mno, m.name, m.tel, m.email, t.hmpg, null as path from tcher t inner join memb m on t.tno=m.mno order by m.name asc limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
select m.mno, m.name, m.tel, m.email, t.hmpg, t.fcbk, t.twit, tp.path from tcher t inner join memb m on t.tno=m.mno left outer join tch_phot tp on t.tno=tp.tno where mno = #{memberNo}

select m.mno, m.name, m.tel, m.email, t.hmpg, t.fcbk, t.twit, tp.path from tcher t inner join memb m on t.tno=m.mno left outer join tch_phot tp on t.tno=tp.tno where email=#{email} and pwd=password(#{password})
mapper.insert: insert into tcher(tno, hmpg, fcbk, twit) values(#{no}, #{homepage}, #{facebook}, #{twitter})
